text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ku bwanjye, nta bushobozi mfite bwo kugira ikibi nakwikiza cyangwa ngo ngire icyiza nakwimarira uretse icyo Allah yashaka. Buri muryango (Umat) wagenewe igihe ntarengwa (cyo kubaho); iyo igihe cyabo kigeze, ntibarindirizwa na gato cyangwa ngo bihutishwe mbere yacyo.”
